description: Handsome doctor Diego Sans has a new surgery request from his new hunky patient, Vadim Black, and his blue-eyed boyfriend, Scott Riley. Athletic Scott can’t handle muscular Vadim’s huge cock in his tight ass, and wants him to get it reduced. Fit Diego asks them to show him exactly how they fuck right there in the office which inevitably gets the doctor so horny that he ends up joining the demonstration so he can make a more thorough analysis.
title: Plastics Part 2
